title: Envelope, "IBM Think", ca. 1956
medium: Offset lithograph on cream business envelope
markings:
Watermarks: two marks both cut off (recto: left side across): MORE WRITING/ COTTON FIBER U.S.A.; recto: right side across: HMORE V-/ 25% COTTON FIBER

The uncut version of this mark is most likely: STRATHMORE WRITING/ 25% COTTON FIBER U.S.A.
inscribed: Imprinted in blue ink, upper left corner: Think; imprinted in black ink, upper left corner  (underneath Think) on slant (up from left to right): The IBM Magazine/ One Barker Avenue, White Plains/ New York 10601
dimensions:
Closed: 10.5 x 24 cm (4 1/8 x 9 1/4 in. )
Opened: 15 x 24 cm (5 13/16 x 9 1/8 in.)
description: Cream business envelope (has matching letterhead).  Recto: imprinted in blue ink, upper left corner, "Think." Imprinted in black ink, upper left quadrant, company title and address. Verso: blank.

tombstone.epitaph:
Envelope, "IBM Think", ca. 1956.
ca. 1956. Offset lithograph on cream business envelope. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-59.
